TopicTitle: Close button on the science window

Articles.Content:
On the "Review Stored Data" window, it would be nice to have a close button.  I have stations with dozens of stored experiments waiting to be processed by the lab.  When I go to refill the lab, the first few fill it up, and then I have to click "Keep Experiment" another 50 times or so to get the window to close. 

There's probably a way to do this already, but if not, it would make a nice feature.
Does any sort of get to map view/hit esc/change vessel (if there's one) etc help? I mean that would be a workaround but maybe it works
